title: How to keep reading when I don't want to - Quora

response.answer_text: Unless it is required reading, such as for school or work, just stop. Nothing will make you enjoy reading less than reading something you don’t want to. There’s a wide range of things to read, you should be able to find something that you enjoy. And if you do not enjoy reading, but want to try anyway, try reading short stories. Or non fiction short stories, such as Malcolm Gladwell articles.
